But first of all, let's introduce

country I'm from and my name is Elod
Moo. I graduated a 2D animation school
in 2008 and during my animation school
during my studies I realized I was not
really made to be an artist. Well, I
literally I couldn't picture myself to
be an artist. Yet, I still wanted to
work in the animation industry. And so,
instead of being an animator or a

in my career, I was really lucky to
travel all across the world to meet
incredible people and to visit
incredible studios as well from the
United States to Japan and obviously

make sure everyone understand each
